attributes.action: make it by law no more than 2 vehicles per household
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 2 adults and 3 children in late teens,early 20s.. mum and dad have car each. 2 of the children have cars for knocking about .. 1 has a car for college.. dad also has van for work.. 6 vehicles per household.. make mum drop dad at work to get van.. make 1 of the kids drop the other 2 off and get the bloody bus back..
